projects.title: Italy Market
projects.text:
• I developed a Telegram bot platform
  • It used in the most popular channels for Iranian in Italy to exchange their goods and services.
  • I have developed a telegram bot to help them to find their needs easily.

projects.title: Italy Covid
projects.text:
• I developed a covid case prediction for Italy that used time series online algorithms
  • I't predict daily covid cases in Italy with 5% error.
  • Source of data was from health ministery of Italy

interests: Taking project ownership to ensure success and enhance team dynamics.
Engaging in brainstorming and creative problem-solving.
Collaborating with a team focused on clean code, optimization, and maintainability.
Exploring strongly typed languages and Golang capabilities in various domains.
Maintaining simplicity and being mindful of future developers.
Keen to learn and use Artificial Intelligence and recommender systems to improve projects.
Fostering collaboration and friendliness through casual team conversations.
Having and creating good working for environment to have benefits for all people.
